name: A Season With
overview: From the classroom to the locker room to the kick-off each week, viewers are transported behind-the-scenes, beyond the field and into the lives of these student athletes as they compete throughout the season. Go deep inside the world of a Division One college football program and follow the players and coaches as their respective season long journeys unfold.

seasons.name: Notre Dame Football
seasons.overview: Season one chronicles the University of Notre Dame's Fighting Irish and their quest for a college football national championship. Experience the intensity of each week's game - from the locker room, to the classroom and beyond. Delve into the lives of the team and staff both on and off the field with exclusive access to head coach Brian Kelly and his players as they strive for gridiron glory.

seasons.name: Florida State Football
seasons.overview: One of the biggest and most explosive teams in college football is gearing up for another title run and season two gives you a front row seat with unprecedented on and off the field access to FSU's Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher as they navigate a season of high expectations.

seasons.name: Navy Football
seasons.overview:
Enter the world of the U.S. Naval Academy, where student-athletes must not only balance the rigorous demands of an elite academic institution with top-tier collegiate football, but must also prepare themselves for naval service.  

Play with passion. Serve with honor.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A Season with Notre Dame Football takes an in depth look at Fighting Irish football prior to the start of the 2015 season. It talks to defensive starters Sheldon Day and Joe Schmidt, watches as walk-on Josh Anderson receives a scholarship, looks at the preseason injury to Jarron Jones, and interviews his replacement Jerry Tillery.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After a devastating season-ending injury to QB Malik Zaire, the Notre Dame Fighting Irish rally with a 39-yard TD pass to WR Will Fuller, silencing a Virginia Cavaliers upset.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Drue Tranquill gets the game ball after ND's 30-22 win over Georgia Tech. Tranquill turns in an inspiring performance on defense before suffering a season-ending ACL injury.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Injured QB Malik Zaire talks to Offensive Coordinator Mike Sanford about his desire to do everything he can to work on his game following his season-ending fractured ankle.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The Fighting Irish suffer their first loss of the season in Clemson's Death Valley, prompting Coach Brian Kelly to assert his expectations for the team.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: With a spot in the College Football Playoffs potentially hanging in the balance, the Fighting Irish take on one of their longest-standing and fiercest rivals: Navy.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish rally for 17 fourth quarter points to defeat the Trojans 41-31 one year after a devastating loss to their archrival.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A mid-season break gives the players time off to see family, recharge their batteries and contemplate what it'll take to complete their mission.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: "October is for pretenders. We're in November now, boys. We're going to make it a November to remember."

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After being sidelined since week two with an ankle injury, Notre Dame QB Malik Zaire remains competitive and is doing everything he can to contribute towards his team's success.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Notre Dame quarterback DeShone Kizer beats himself up over some off-target passes during exclusive coverage of the Irish's dominant victory over Wake Forest.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish take in the atmosphere of Fenway Park upon arriving in Boston for their Shamrock Series matchup against the Boston College Eagles.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Notre Dame has their playoffs dream cut short after losing their second game of the season following a clutch field goal by the Stanford Cardinal. Despite their heart wrenching loss, the Irish await their NCAA bowl game matchup.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: After losing to Ohio State in the Fiesta Bowl, Coach Brian Kelly offers one final locker room speech to his Fighting Irish team, who persevere to finish off a great season despite injuries and other obstacles. Season finale.

1.name: Notre Dame Football
1.overview: Season one chronicles the University of Notre Dame's Fighting Irish and their quest for a college football national championship. Experience the intensity of each week's game - from the locker room, to the classroom and beyond. Delve into the lives of the team and staff both on and off the field with exclusive access to head coach Brian Kelly and his players as they strive for gridiron glory.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Florida State's Seminole Nation takes on the Rebels of Ole Miss.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Florida State Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher go up against the Buccaneers of CSU.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: FSU's Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher take the field in Louisville against the UofL Cardinals.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The Seminoles battle the USF Bulls in Tampa.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Florida State's Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher try to convert a home field advantage over UNC's Tar Heels.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The Seminoles go into the eye of the storm against archrivals Miami.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Florida State's Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher go up against the Demon Deacons of Wake Forest.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Coach Jimbo Fisher and his players take stock of the first half of the season and set their sights on rival Clemson.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Florida State's Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher go into the den against NC State's Wolfpack.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: FSU's Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher take the field against the Boston College Eagles.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Coach Jimbo Fisher and the Seminoles hit the road to try and juice the Orange in Syracuse.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Florida State's Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher in a home turf battle versus Sunshine State archrivals, the Florida Gators.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Florida State's Seminoles and Coach Jimbo Fisher prepare to meet No. 6 Michigan in the Capital One Orange Bowl. Series finale.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Coach Ken Niumatalolo and the USNA Midshipmen take on the Florida Atlantic Owls.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Navy plays host to Tulane's Green Wave in Annapolis.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Coach Ken Niumatalolo and the USNA Midshipmen take on the pride of Cincinnati - the Bearcats.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Coach Niumatalolo and USNA's Midshipmen face off against the storm of Tulsa's Golden Hurricane.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Navy plays host to rival academy USAF and the Falcons in Annapolis.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Coach Ken Niumatalolo and the USNA Midshipmen take on the University of Memphis Tigers.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Midshipmen of USNA tackle the black and gold Knights of UCF.
